topic.title: Remote XUL + raspberry + firefox
topic.body:
Fo some reasons, I got a problem when I try to open links or create a zeromail account. I installed a Firefox addon, called remote xul , but nothing changed, even after a special setup. 
Then I installed chromium-browser and everything works fine. 
I also tried midori and other web browsers and nothing worked...  The only one is chromium-browser!

7_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa.body: In my case, I can connect via vnc on my Raspberry and launch it  from the desktop. When I disconnect, Zeronet is still running ;)
